00050     WorldQueryTool::WorldQueryTool(World* GameWorld_)
00051     {
00052         this->GameWorld = GameWorld_;
00053 
00054         this->MouseButtonCache.reset();
00055 
00056         this->KeyboardButtonCache.reset();
00057 
00058         this->MouseXCache=0;
00059         this->MouseYCache=0;
00060 
00061         // create the ray scene query object
00062         this->RayQuery = this->GameWorld->OgreSceneManager->createRayQuery(Ogre::Ray(), Ogre::SceneManager::WORLD_GEOMETRY_TYPE_MASK);
00063         if (NULL == this->RayQuery)
00064             {this->GameWorld->LogAndThrow("Failed to create RaySceneQuery instance in WorldQueryTool"); }
00065         this->RayQuery->setSortByDistance(true);
00066     }
00067 
00068     WorldQueryTool::~WorldQueryTool()
00069     {
00070         delete this->RayQuery;
00071     }
00072

00074         {return this->MouseXCache;}
00075 
00076     Whole WorldQueryTool::GetMouseY()
00077         {return this->MouseYCache;}

00079     bool WorldQueryTool::IsMouseButtonPushed(short unsigned int MouseButton)
00080     {
00081         if(MouseButton >= this->MouseButtonLimit)
00082             {this->GameWorld->LogAndThrow("Unsupported mouse button access through WorldQueryTool");}
00083         return this->MouseButtonCache[MouseButton];
00084     }
00085 
00086     bool WorldQueryTool::IsKeyboardButtonPushed(MetaCode::InputCode KeyboardButton)
00087         {return this->KeyboardButtonCache[KeyboardButton];}

00090     void WorldQueryTool::GatherEvents(bool ClearEventsFromEventMgr)
00091     {
00092         //this->KeyboardButtonCache.reset();
00093 
00094         std::list<EventUserInput*>* UserInput = this->GameWorld->Events->GetAllUserInputEvents();   // Get the updated list of events
00095         if( ClearEventsFromEventMgr )
00096             { this->GameWorld->Events->RemoveAllSpecificEvents(EventBase::UserInput); }
00097 
00098         //For each metacode adjust any needed info
00099         for(std::list<EventUserInput*>::iterator Iter = UserInput->begin(); Iter!=UserInput->end(); Iter++) //for each event
00100         {
00101             for(unsigned int c = 0; c<(*Iter)->GetMetaCodeCount(); c++) //For each metacode in the event
00102             {                                                           //Newer Items should take precedence of older ones, so only store the oldest ones
00103                 if( (*Iter)->GetMetaCode(c).IsKeyboardButton() ) //is it a Key
00104                 {
00105                     if(0 <= (*Iter)->GetMetaCode(c).GetMetaValue()) //see MetaCode::ButtonState
00106                     {
00107                         this->KeyboardButtonCache.set( (*Iter)->GetMetaCode(c).GetCode() );
00108                     }else{
00109                         this->KeyboardButtonCache.reset( (*Iter)->GetMetaCode(c).GetCode() );
00110                     }
00111                 }
00112 
00113                 if ( MetaCode::MOUSEABSOLUTEHORIZONTAL == (*Iter)->GetMetaCode(c).GetCode() )
00114                     { this->MouseXCache = (*Iter)->GetMetaCode(c).GetMetaValue(); }
00115 
00116                 if ( MetaCode::MOUSEABSOLUTEVERTICAL == (*Iter)->GetMetaCode(c).GetCode() )
00117                     { this->MouseYCache = (*Iter)->GetMetaCode(c).GetMetaValue(); }
00118 
00119                 if ( MetaCode::MOUSEBUTTON == (*Iter)->GetMetaCode(c).GetCode() )
00120                 {
00121                     if(0 <= (*Iter)->GetMetaCode(c).GetMetaValue()) //see MetaCode::ButtonState
00122                     {
00123                         this->MouseButtonCache.set( (*Iter)->GetMetaCode(c).GetID() );
00124                     }else{
00125                         this->MouseButtonCache.reset( (*Iter)->GetMetaCode(c).GetID() );
00126                     }
00127                 }
00128                 /// @todo Add support for joysticks events to WorldQueryTool
00129             }
00130         }
00131 
00132         if( ClearEventsFromEventMgr )//Erase everything if we were asked to.
00133         {
00134             for(std::list<EventUserInput*>::iterator Iter = UserInput->begin(); !UserInput->empty(); Iter = UserInput->begin())
00135             {
00136                 delete(*Iter);
00137                 UserInput->remove(*Iter);
00138             }
00139         }
00140     } // \GatherEvents

00142     Vector3WActor* WorldQueryTool::GetFirstActorOnRayByPolygon(Ray ActorRay)
00143     {
00144         Ogre::Ray Ooray = ActorRay.GetOgreRay();
00145 
00146         if(NULL != this->RayQuery)          //Double check that the Rayquery is valid
00147         {
00148             this->RayQuery->setRay(Ooray);
00149             if( this->RayQuery->execute().size() <= 0 ) //Did we hit anything
00150             {
00151                 return NULL;
00152             }
00153         }else{                          //Whoopsie something Failed
00154             this->GameWorld->LogAndThrow("Attempting to run a query on Null RaySceneQuery");
00155         }
00156 
00157         // at this point we have raycast to a series of different objects bounding boxes.
00158         // we need to test these different objects to see which is the first polygon hit.
00159         // there are some minor optimizations (distance based) that mean we wont have to
00160         // check all of the objects most of the time, but the worst case scenario is that
00161         // we need to test every triangle of every object.
00162         Ogre::Real closest_distance = -1.0f;
00163         Vector3 closest_result;
00164         Ogre::RaySceneQueryResult &query_result = this->RayQuery->getLastResults();
00165         Vector3WActor* ClosestActor = new Vector3WActor();
00166         for (size_t qr_idx = 0; qr_idx < query_result.size(); qr_idx++)
00167         {
00168             // stop checking if we have found a raycast hit that is closer than all remaining entities
00169             if ( (0.0f <= closest_distance) && (closest_distance < query_result[qr_idx].distance))
00170                 { break; }
00171 
00172             // only check this result if its a hit against an entity
00173             if ((NULL != query_result[qr_idx].movable) && (0 == query_result[qr_idx].movable->getMovableType().compare("Entity")))
00174             {
00175                 // get the entity to check
00176                 Ogre::Entity *pentity = static_cast<Ogre::Entity*>(query_result[qr_idx].movable);
00177 
00178                 // mesh data to retrieve
00179                 size_t vertex_count;
00180                 size_t index_count;
00181                 Ogre::Vector3 *vertices;
00182                 unsigned long *indices;
00183 
00184                 // get the mesh information
00185                 this->GetMeshInformation(pentity, vertex_count, vertices, index_count, indices,
00186                                   pentity->getParentNode()->_getDerivedPosition(),
00187                                   pentity->getParentNode()->_getDerivedOrientation(),
00188                                   pentity->getParentNode()->_getDerivedScale());
00189 
00190                 // test for hitting individual triangles on the mesh
00191                 bool new_closest_found = false;
00192                 for (size_t i = 0; i < index_count; i += 3)
00193                 {
00194                     // check for a hit against this triangle
00195                     std::pair<bool, Ogre::Real> hit = Ogre::Math::intersects(Ooray, vertices[indices[i]], vertices[indices[i+1]], vertices[indices[i+2]], true, false);
00196 
00197                     // if it was a hit check if its the closest
00198                     if (hit.first && ((0.0f > closest_distance) || (hit.second < closest_distance)) )
00199                     {
00200                         closest_distance = hit.second;                        // this is the closest so far, save it off
00201                         new_closest_found = true;
00202                     }
00203                 }
00204 
00205                 // free the verticies and indicies memory
00206                 delete[] vertices;
00207                 delete[] indices;
00208 
00209                 // if we found a new closest raycast for this object, update the closest_result before moving on to the next object.
00210                 if (new_closest_found)
00211                 {
00212                     closest_result = Ooray.getPoint(closest_distance);
00213                     ClosestActor->Actor = this->GameWorld->Actors->FindActor( pentity->getParentNode() );
00214                 }
00215             } // \if entity
00216         } // \if qr_idx
00217 
00218         //Change the closest point into a point relative to the Actor
00219         if (ClosestActor->Actor != NULL)
00220             { ClosestActor->Vector = closest_result - ClosestActor->Actor->GetLocation(); }
00221         return ClosestActor;
00222     }
00223 
00224 
00225     // Private Members
00226     void WorldQueryTool::GetMeshInformation( Ogre::Entity *entity,
00227                                 size_t &vertex_count,
00228                                 Ogre::Vector3* &vertices,
00229                                 size_t &index_count,
00230                                 unsigned long* &indices,
00231                                 const Ogre::Vector3 &position,
00232                                 const Ogre::Quaternion &orient,
00233                                 const Ogre::Vector3 &scale)
00234     {
00235         bool added_shared = false;
00236         size_t current_offset = 0;
00237         size_t shared_offset = 0;
00238         size_t next_offset = 0;
00239         size_t index_offset = 0;
00240         vertex_count = index_count = 0;
00241 
00242         Ogre::MeshPtr mesh = entity->getMesh();
00243 
00244 
00245         bool useSoftwareBlendingVertices = entity->hasSkeleton();
00246 
00247         if (useSoftwareBlendingVertices)
00248         {                                   //10,000th line of code
00249             entity->_updateAnimation();
00250         }
00251 
00252         // Calculate how many vertices and indices we're going to need
00253         for (unsigned short i = 0; i < mesh->getNumSubMeshes(); ++i)
00254         {
00255             Ogre::SubMesh* submesh = mesh->getSubMesh( i );
00256 
00257             // We only need to add the shared vertices once
00258             if(submesh->useSharedVertices)
00259             {
00260                 if( !added_shared )
00261                 {
00262                     vertex_count += mesh->sharedVertexData->vertexCount;
00263                     added_shared = true;
00264                 }
00265             }
00266             else
00267             {
00268                 vertex_count += submesh->vertexData->vertexCount;
00269             }
00270 
00271             // Add the indices
00272             index_count += submesh->indexData->indexCount;
00273         }
00274 
00275 
00276         // Allocate space for the vertices and indices
00277         vertices = new Ogre::Vector3[vertex_count];
00278         indices = new unsigned long[index_count];
00279 
00280         added_shared = false;
00281 
00282         // Run through the submeshes again, adding the data into the arrays
00283         for ( unsigned short i = 0; i < mesh->getNumSubMeshes(); ++i)
00284         {
00285             Ogre::SubMesh* submesh = mesh->getSubMesh(i);
00286 
00287             //Ogre::VertexData* vertex_data = submesh->useSharedVertices ? mesh->sharedVertexData : submesh->vertexData;
00288             Ogre::VertexData* vertex_data;
00289 
00290             //When there is animation:
00291             if(useSoftwareBlendingVertices)
00292             {
00293                 //    #ifdef BUILD_AGAINST_AZATHOTH
00294                 //             vertex_data = submesh->useSharedVertices ? entity->_getSharedBlendedVertexData() : entity->getSubEntity(i)->_getBlendedVertexData();
00295                 //    #else
00296                 vertex_data = submesh->useSharedVertices ? entity->_getSkelAnimVertexData() : entity->getSubEntity(i)->_getSkelAnimVertexData();
00297                 //    #endif
00298             }else{
00299                 vertex_data = submesh->useSharedVertices ? mesh->sharedVertexData : submesh->vertexData;
00300             }
00301 
00302             if((!submesh->useSharedVertices)||(submesh->useSharedVertices && !added_shared))
00303             {
00304                 if(submesh->useSharedVertices)
00305                 {
00306                     added_shared = true;
00307                     shared_offset = current_offset;
00308                 }
00309 
00310                 const Ogre::VertexElement* posElem = vertex_data->vertexDeclaration->findElementBySemantic(Ogre::VES_POSITION);
00311                 Ogre::HardwareVertexBufferSharedPtr vbuf = vertex_data->vertexBufferBinding->getBuffer(posElem->getSource());
00312                 unsigned char* vertex = static_cast<unsigned char*>(vbuf->lock(Ogre::HardwareBuffer::HBL_READ_ONLY));
00313 
00314                 // There is _no_ baseVertexPointerToElement() which takes an Ogre::Real or a double
00315                 //  as second argument. So make it float, to avoid trouble when Ogre::Real will
00316                 //  be comiled/typedefed as double:
00317                 //      Ogre::Real* pReal;
00318                 float* pReal;
00319 
00320                 for( size_t j = 0; j < vertex_data->vertexCount; ++j, vertex += vbuf->getVertexSize())
00321                 {
00322                     posElem->baseVertexPointerToElement(vertex, &pReal);
00323                     Ogre::Vector3 pt(pReal[0], pReal[1], pReal[2]);
00324                     vertices[current_offset + j] = (orient * (pt * scale)) + position;
00325                 }
00326 
00327                 vbuf->unlock();
00328                 next_offset += vertex_data->vertexCount;
00329             }
00330 
00331 
00332             Ogre::IndexData* index_data = submesh->indexData;
00333             size_t numTris = index_data->indexCount / 3;
00334             Ogre::HardwareIndexBufferSharedPtr ibuf = index_data->indexBuffer;
00335 
00336             bool use32bitindexes = (ibuf->getType() == Ogre::HardwareIndexBuffer::IT_32BIT);
00337 
00338             unsigned long*  pLong = static_cast<unsigned long*>(ibuf->lock(Ogre::HardwareBuffer::HBL_READ_ONLY));
00339             unsigned short* pShort = reinterpret_cast<unsigned short*>(pLong);
00340 
00341 
00342             size_t offset = (submesh->useSharedVertices)? shared_offset : current_offset;
00343             size_t index_start = index_data->indexStart;
00344             size_t last_index = numTris*3 + index_start;
00345 
00346             if (use32bitindexes)
00347             {
00348                 for (size_t k = index_start; k < last_index; ++k)
00349                     { indices[index_offset++] = pLong[k] + static_cast<unsigned long>( offset ); }
00350             }else{
00351                 for (size_t k = index_start; k < last_index; ++k)
00352                     { indices[ index_offset++ ] = static_cast<unsigned long>( pShort[k] ) + static_cast<unsigned long>( offset ); }
00353             }
00354 
00355             ibuf->unlock();
00356             current_offset = next_offset;
00357         }
00358     }
00359 }
